Description: UK Self Assessment Return for MTT/DTT

Jurisdiction: 1. FY2024_Deadline: Deadline for fiscal year ending 31 December 2024 (first GIR year for most)
2. First year extension of 18 months applies to first GIR filing only - subsequent years 15 months
3. Reminder_Days_Before: Set calendar reminders this many days before deadline
4. Status: Pending/In Progress/Filed/Confirmed - update as obligations are completed
5. Deadlines assume December 31 fiscal year end - adjust for non-calendar year ends
6. Per OECD AG: No filing obligations before June 30 2026 regardless of calculation
7. Always verify deadlines against official tax authority sources before filing
